heroSection.title:
Patronat
de festes de
heroSection.description: Everything you need to know about the festivities in Roquetes is just one click away.

aboutSection.title: Who We Are?
aboutSection.description: We are residents of Roquetes who believe in the value of participation and teamwork. Behind the Patronat are many hours of dedication, meetings, ideas, and above all, a shared great enthusiasm. We work closely with the Town Hall and other local entities to make each celebration special, close, and authentic. If you want to know more, participate, or simply share with us this passion for traditions, you are invited: the Patronat is also yours.
aboutSection.historyDescription: The Patronat de Festes de Roquetes was founded in 1973 with a clear goal: to preserve and promote the popular festivals that bring our city to life. Since then, we have been an essential part of Roquetes' identity, organizing celebrations each year that combine tradition, culture, and participation. Over the years, more than a hundred people have contributed their effort and passion to consolidate this entity as one of the municipality's festive pillars. Today, with over five decades of history, we continue to grow with the same spirit with which we started: making each festa a reflection of Roquetes' soul.
aboutSection.motivationDescription: We believe that festivals are much more than celebrations: they are moments that strengthen bonds, connect us with our roots, and allow us to share the best of ourselves. We are motivated to see children, youth, and adults experience each act, each tradition, and each gathering with enthusiasm. We work passionately to offer inclusive, creative, and community-minded proposals. Our motivation is clear: to continue building, through festivals, a vibrant, united Roquetes proud of its culture.
aboutSection.defaultDescription: This staff member has no description available.

wantToParticipateSection.title: Want to Participate?
wantToParticipateSection.firstPar: There are many ways to help and participate in the setup of festivals and events held throughout the year.
wantToParticipateSection.secondPar: You can participate by becoming a member of the association and enjoy all the events of the year, which also includes entry to the town's main festivals each year.
wantToParticipateSection.thirdPar: If you have a group of friends, you can also participate by registering as a crew in the crew contest held each year.
wantToParticipateSection.linksPar: <2>Click here</2> to see the requirements to participate in the crew contest or <1>here</1> to register as a member.

registerPartners.title: Partner Registration
registerPartners.descriptionLabel:
Supporting the Patronat is easy: just become a partner. By joining, you not only collaborate with a cause that drives our traditions and activities, but also enjoy numerous exclusive benefits.

As a partner, you'll get special discounts on all events organized by the Patronat. One of the highlights is the ticket for the Main Festivals, which you can get at a reduced price and pay in three convenient installments throughout the year. Enjoy more, pay less, and stress-free!

To join and start enjoying all these benefits, simply complete the following form. We will contact you via the email you provide to finalize the registration process.

validation.invalidDni: Please enter a valid ID (8 numbers and a letter).
validation.invalidIban: Please enter a valid IBAN (format ES + 22 digits).
validation.invalidDate: Please enter a valid birth date.
